name: Crypt Crush
description:
Crypt Crush is a fast paced action packed 3D platformer. Where your goal is to smash your way through numerous rooms in a dungeon-like environment. Using the sorcery imbued in your gauntlets you can blast away your enemies with powerful magic or, if your mana is low, you’ll have to resort to brute strength to crush your foes.

Should you progress far enough you will have to test your might against numerous trials and tribulations. Conquering these feats will reward you with new abilities. Perishing here can prove Fatal.

Do you have what it takes to traverse the Crypt?

Credits:
